mapper.insert: insert into schedule (s_no, p_no, s_date, s_time, min_people, max_people) values (seq_schedule.nextval, #{p_no}, to_date(#{s_date}, 'YY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{s_time}, 'HH24:MI'), #{min_people, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{max_people, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update schedule set s_date=#{s_date}, s_time=#{s_time} where s_no=#{s_no}
mapper.select: select s_no, p_no, s_date, s_time, min_people, max_people from schedule where p_no = #{p_no} order by s_no
